name: Creator of instability
description:
Kindergarten is fun and interesting, and the heart will always be filled with joy, one has only to cross the threshold. Or not? To enter an elite kindergarten, the main character will have to pass an unusual test proposed by the teacher. And who knows what secrets this woman hides?

The game contains:

  • gravity physics puzzles
  • creepy secrets
  • fun

P.S. This is my second game made with the Godot Engine. Project was created for Godot Wild Jam #49
